item.title: Ganjawoz removed my house completely D:
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Mistakes are made, it’s a part of life. The person who did this is clearly very sorry for what he did, and as a general guideline, it’s best to just avoid damaging/adding onto others property without their permissions at all.

I’ll move this to solved in a few hours, I’m just curious to see anymore input.

item.title: Ganjawoz removed my house completely D:
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“Ganjawoz, post:6, topic:449403”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=552301.msg4046071#msg4046071 date=1342120717]

“what’s a ganjawoz? An std?”

Was never said.
[/quote]

Grow up. Wasn’t it you that said it? I would’ve screenshotted it if I knew I was battling against some very passionate kids.[/quote]

Yea it was me, tbh I don’t think you should be banned, but it was fun to fight with you.

item.title: Ganjawoz removed my house completely D:
item.dc:creator: @Ganjawoz Ganjawoz
item.description:
@Ganjawoz wrote:

It’s more of a sarcastic attitude because I didn’t know he’d be this childish about it. Just the way I am…

But I genuinely am sorry, krack. There’s nothing else I can do but if you and people like Relm are gonna carry on harassing me I’ll just go lol O_o

item.title: Ganjawoz removed my house completely D:
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

He destroyed the house, he also apologized about it. He obviously is new to the server and didn’t know the rules (just like every other newfag).

Ganjawoz, that tough guy attitude isn’t going to get you anywhere, nor does it make you sound cool. The best thing you can do is apologize so the mods can see you truely didn’t mean to grief.

item.source: Ganjawoz removed my house completely D:

item.title: Ganjawoz removed my house completely D:
item.dc:creator: @Ganjawoz Ganjawoz
item.description:
@Ganjawoz wrote:

Wow, I didn’t think you’d be this childish about the situation.

I admit I did take down your house today, I didn’t know it was being used. It had no sign on and nothing in, including doors and windows. I wasn’t sure if there was a rule about grieving unused buildings.

I’ve learnt now, said sorry, built you a new, safer house, but you’re still trying to get me banned for my first very stupid mistake. And all I get is “you’re a newfag” “what’s a ganjawoz? An std?” lol. Chin up, next time I’ll polish your shoes.

Read full topic
